short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An insightful plugin delivering bite-sized trading related wisdom - stolo.in

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a plugin from stolo.in which is Ultimate Option Trading Platform built for retail traders. This plugin offers you bite-sized trading wisdom that can help you build a right trading mindset sub-consiously. What you see everday, is what you become and that's what this extension helps you.
